text: "My Old School" is a 1973 song by Steely Dan and is the second single from their second studio album Countdown to Ecstasy. It went to number 63 in the United States and tells the story of the May 1969 drug bust at Bard School. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Steely Dan songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Jazz pop songs Category:Jazz rock songs
title: My Old School (song)
